name: Canine Cupid V.2
description: Lite tinder clone focused on finding your furry friend, a friend.
acompOne: React app utilizing: context, state, hooks, router, etc.
acompTwo: Styled 100% by me, undertook a complete redesign from the original version
acompThree: Node.js backend, deployed on Heroku, with MongoDB
acompFour: Static hosting with AWS S3 bucket

name: Peak
description: Peak is my blogging application, used to document new information or further explore concepts.
acompOne: Initally a JS/JQuery project, Peak was refactored and moved to React
acompTwo: Node.js server, storing blog and user information in MySQL Database
acompThree: Secure login using session token and validated credentials

name: Breakout
description: Fantasy project that let's the users create teams and live out their dreams of being a championship winner.
acompOne: Originally created using JS/JQuery and Bootstrap, later migrated to React app
acompTwo: MongoDB connection to store user data and team data
acompThree: MongoDB backend, moving to MySQL in the near future
acompFour: Styled using the CSS preprocessor, SASS

name: Cocktail HQ
description: Web app centered around alcohol, allowing the user to find new drinks, review drinks theyâ€™ve tried, and pin their favorite.
acompOne: Built using HTML5, CSS3, JS, JQuery and Bootstrap
acompThree: Originally created in a group of three, later refactored and restyled by me
acompFour: Search functionality for just about any drink you could think of

name: IPA's using API's
description: Web application that brings quick and accurate search functionality to locate breweries in your city.
acompOne: A Javascript/JQuery application with an ES5 feel, for the oldies
acompTwo: Uses geolocation to bring you a quick and accurate list of local breweries
acompFour: Front end is deployed using github pages, with Heroku hosting the back end

name: Canine Cupid Mobile
description: Companion application for Canine Cupid, making it easier for users to match on the go.
acompOne: React Native Application, built as a companion app
acompTwo: Firebase back end features include: Auth, Firestore, Realtime DB, Funcs, etc.

name: Canine Cupid
description: Soft release of lite tinder clone used by you and you pup to plan a fun walk in the park with that cute corgi across the street.
acompOne: React application built with Tinder in mind
acompTwo: Node.js back end, utilizing Express, Mongoose, etc.
acompFour: HTML and CSS done entirely by me

name: Logan Portfolio
description: My portfolio, created to showcase my ability as a UI designer.
acompOne: React application making use of React Animations and React Loaders
acompTwo: Makes use of multiple JSON files to allow for swift updates/edits
acompThree: Logo, images, and img sizes all created with Adobe Photoshop
acompFour: Deployed with AWS S3 and CloudFront

name: API Weather App
description: Simple app to check the weather for the week in your area or around the U.S.
acompTwo: Styled by me, with simplicity in mind
acompThree: Five day forcast availible for users with upcoming plans
acompFour: Multiple, seemless, calls to external API
